revised_title: The Solubility of Xenon, Krypton, Argon, Neon, and Helium in Water
tldr: The author investigates the solubility of xenon, krypton, argon, neon, and helium in water, using various experimental methods and apparatus. The study reveals the importance of temperature and pressure in the solubility of these rare gases, and discusses the different opinions on how to calculate the partial pressure of the gas in the solvent.
